title: Divine Mercy
creator: Marian Fathers of the Immaculate Conception

extendedInfo.description: The Marian Fathers of the Immaculate Conception, who have promoted the authentic message of Divine Mercy since 1941, are pleased to release the OFFICIAL Divine Mercy App.This FREE app offers the complete Divine Mercy message and devotion in an easy to navigate format. The app has three main chapters with these features:THE MESSAGEâ¢ Introduction to the message of Divine Mercyâ¢ Biography of St. Faustinaâ¢Â Hundreds of quotes from the Diary of St. Faustina organized according to themes.â¢ Divine Mercy Timelineâ¢ Collection of the top 10 quotes on Divine Mercy from the âMercy Popesâ: John Paul II and Pope Benedict XVIâ¢ List of recommended Divine Mercy resourcesTHE DEVOTIONâ¢Â Interactive Chaplet of Divine Mercy with an audio optionâ¢ Detailed explanation of the three ways to observe the Hour of Great Mercyâ¢ Stations of the Cross, complete with images and the text of St. Faustinaâs Way of the Crossâ¢ Images of Divine Mercyâ¢ Explanation of the Feast of Divine Mercy, also known as Divine Mercy Sunday, complete with answers to frequently asked questionsâ¢ Novena to Divine Mercy and other popular Divine Mercy prayersMERCY PLUSâ¢ Information about the Congregation of Marian Fathers of the Immaculate Conceptionâ¢ Introduction to the Association of Marian Helpersâ¢ Links to the award-winning Marian Helper magazineâ¢ Information about Divine Mercy apostolatesâ¢ Information about the National Shrine of The Divine Mercy, including pilgrimage information and spiritual renewal opportunitiesâ¢ Frequently updated articles on the message of Divine Mercyâ¢ A link to the online religious catalog of the Marian Fathers of the Immaculate ConceptionAccording to Pope John Paul II, "There is nothing that man needs more than Divine Mercy." Moreover, Pope Benedict XVI said, "Devotion to Divine Mercy is not a secondary devotion, but an integral dimension of a Christianâs faith and prayer."Get this app, and discover why the message of Divine Mercy is the largest grassroots movement in the history of the Catholic Church.Divine Mercy â Love it. Live it. Tell a friend.

reviews.title: Blessed to have this app
reviews.comment: I really want to encourage everyone who loves this devotion to put this app on their smartphones. It\'s filled with lots of tidbits that augments my prayers. Grateful to have it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: The diary of st Faustina is really touching.Also the image of divine mercy in this apps comes handy when you want to pray the divine mercy outside .
reviews.author: Raphael Cheong

reviews.comment: Outstanding work on this app on the Divine Mercy devotion!This is awesome. Thank you so much as this will greatly help in our evangelization! EBM.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app!!
reviews.comment: It\'s very comprehensive. I can now pray all of the prayers even if I leave my booklet at home. It gives clear and concise info about the devotion and its history as well as the massive support it has from the Holy See. Thanks to the Marian Fathers or making this app available. GOD BLESS YOU.
reviews.author: Roni M

reviews.title: Jesus, I trust in you!
reviews.comment: This is hands down the best app on my phone... Thank you so much and God Bless your ministry
reviews.author: Neil Boorman

reviews.title: THE COMPLETE APP
reviews.comment: I WAS SEARCHING FOR WAY OF THE CROSS AND I FOUND THIS. THIS IS BEYOND ALL MY EXPECTATIONS.  Many thanks for the creator and 10 stars for your great work! God bless you...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent app
reviews.comment: thx to the Marian fathers for this wonderful app. good resources about the Divine Mercy . how i wish we can have the whole Diary there too .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Titan user
reviews.comment: Very nice application. A must on your phone. Let\'s all support them by promoting this application to others. God bless everyone. Thumbs up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. I say the mercy rosary every day. Could u please develop an app for the ordinary rosary similar 2 this one. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best ever app-!!!
reviews.comment: So excited and feel blessed to have this app. Inceases my devotion to mercy itself...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Beautifully designed and easy to use. It simply and aptly introduces one to the devotion to Christ\'s Divine Mercy. I look forward to using it often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ive been waiting for an app from the Marians...and its way better than I could have imagined!! Love it! Thx!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE THIS ... GREAT APP.
reviews.comment: Terrific. Only prob is \"For sake of\'s\" continue after chaplet ends. No.1potterfan try Interactive Rosary... also audio
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Luv it!
reviews.comment: Its a great app, except when the chaplet is on automatic, it is at the end then automatically starts all over.
reviews.author: Marcelo Rodriguez

reviews.comment: This is such a POWERFUL Prayer and gift from God! My Grandma was diagnosed with breast cancer. She faithfully prayed the Chaplet and WON her battle!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I cant believe this app is free. Its packed with wonderful stuff, lots of info about Divine Mercy, 3 different images to use, the chaplet, the stations of the cross, the list goes on. I love this app and use it everyday. A special thx to the Marian Fathers of the Imaculate Conception.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect but...
reviews.comment: Apostle\'s Creed not updated and the rosary does not stop like it should at the end of prayer. Pray that it gets fixed soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love everything about this app! It\'s a great learning tool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kpet
reviews.comment: This app is wonderful I love it.  my prayer life has been very uplifted thank you so much.I use it everyday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect prayer sequences
reviews.comment: This chaplet is so powerful for anyone. The words are beautiful,inspirational, easy to remember and recite, and using a rosary as a guide if needed. Perfect companion on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User
